Review_Text: This well written and produced documentary illustrates the machinations of how bribery and corruption was finally acknowledged as being integral to the FIFA organisation. It lead to the world shock downfall of Blatter et al., and the years and years of investigations that lead up to that point. It also shows the arrogance of certain Fifa executives who blatantly profited from the game. It is a fitting tribute to those journalists in the world who only want the truth to be told. Who knows what FIFA would have been like today if it was not for Andrew Jennings brilliant work over decades.Insightful and definitely worth watching.
